744150.name: The Official AppGameKit Tutorial Guide Vol 2
744150.description:
The Official AppGameKit Tutorial Guide Volume 2 has over 900 pages and gives you the expertise needed to fully express your imagination and create your own professional-level games. The Guide explores the more advanced commands of AppGameKit, with detailed explanations of the statements, often with sample programs to show exactly how the statements operate and how they can be used. The Volume 2 Guide tackles more complex categories such as 3D, terrains, physics and memblocks, and builds on the areas covered in Volume 1.

The Official AppGameKit Tutorial Guides are so much more than just reference books - they are designed to train you in the art of computer programming.

It will teach you how to:

  • Tween 2D animations
  • Work with bone animations with Skeletons
  • Create Graphical User Interfaces
  • Understand the benefits of Memblocks
  • Create Beautiful Fractal Images
  • Learn about 2D Physics
  • Grasp the basics of 3D Graphics
  • Control Cameras and Lights in a 3D Scene
  • See the logic behind a 3D Solitaire game
  • Learn about game networking
  • Access Servers
  • Study a multiplayer game
  • Investigate game AI
